title: Instructional Designers' Value Realization Strategies in Online Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Learning Environment Proficiency and Specialized Knowledge in Science
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals in medical, legal, or technical fields interested in designing online courses for scientific problem-solving.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and design the values of diverse stakeholders in online learning environments.
Learners can develop at least two online science education activity scenarios by applying value-sensitive design principles.
Learners can revise and improve design deliverables based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
